data.title: Case Studies
data.text:
Atlantis Dubai: Network

Q-SYS delivers a flexible and scalable AV-over-IP solution to help Atlantis Dubai bring audio, video and control to its full potential.

Universität Lübeck

At the University of Lübeck, Q-SYS enables top-level research and innovation by broadcasting lectures globally and facilitating worldwide participant interaction.

IHK Hannover

The IHK Hannover (Chamber of Industry and Commerce) implemented customized, state-of-the-art Q-SYS conference technology in its new building, impressing politicians, employees, and trainees alike.

PINKTUM

PINKTUM, a leader in digital learning content, uses Q-SYS to champion innovative work methods and digital communication in their new office design.

Harry Brot

Baked goods manufacturer, Harry Brot, implemented a modern boardroom with Q-SYS for hybrid meetings with partners, customers and stakeholders around the world.

MIX Brussels

MIX Brussels uses Q-SYS audio and control to seamlessly enhance the unique ambience in each space of this unique destination hotel.

The Roxy Cinema

The Roxy Cinema in Wellington leverages Q-SYS to enhance its event operations, streamline control, and open new opportunities for revenue.

Hard Rock International

Hard Rock International selects Q-SYS to standardize control and audio DSP across the entirety of their Cafes, hotels, resorts and casinos.

Nieuwspoort

Nieuwspoort connects, operates and supports its diverse spaces using

Q-SYS for a simplified audio, video and control solution.

Give Kids The World Village

Nonprofit theme park and resort providing wish vacations for critically ill families leverages Q-SYS for control automation, audio paths, sensors, and more.

Pinterest

Pinterest discovers the versatility of the Q-SYS vCore to rapidly deploy room control capabilities on top of their existing Google Meet hardware.

Falkland Cricket Club

Falkland Cricket Club deploys Q-SYS for a centralised, simplified audio, video and control solution across all areas of their new pavilion.

Indiana University

Indiana University selects Q-SYS to act as a flexible foundation for mass deployment across five hundred classrooms and multiple campuses.

Royal Caribbean

Royal Caribbean displays the resilience and convenience of the

Q-SYS Platform across its fleet.

Fortress

Fortress realizes the potential of the Core Nano in a cutting-edge gaming and esports installation.

Royal College of Physicians

The Spine harnesses the flexibility of the Q-SYS Platform to deliver hybrid learning, development and events.

Pavilion Case Study

Q-SYS proves to be a sound decision as the selected partner for the revitalization of the historic Pavilion Cinema.

Resorts World Las Vegas: Network

Resorts World Las Vegas and Q-SYS partner to pioneer one of the largest AV-over-IP networks in the world.

Resorts World Las Vegas: Common Areas

The varied requirements of Resorts World Las Vegas common areas are brought to their full potential with

Q-SYS.

Gateway

Q-SYS partners with Sennheiser and Barco to provide Gateway with a truly modern conferencing solution.

Bentley University

Bentley University chose Q-SYS to scale hybrid learning environment to all of their classrooms on campus.

One Night Records

One Night Records deployed a singular processing solution for multiple stages along with the power and reliability of QSC powered loudspeakers.

Camp Randall

The Q-SYS Platform manages wide-area audio and paging distribution and offers software-based control for Camp Randall and other University of Wisconsin athletic facilities.

Adiparashakthi College Group

Adhiparasakthi College of Arts and Sciences revamps their 1,200-seat auditorium using Q-SYS control and peripherals.

Castanea Best Western Resort

Castanea Best Western Resort modernizes eight multi-functional rooms with an intuitive focus using the Q-SYS Platform.

Prospector Theater

The Prospector Theater was completely rebuilt from the ground up with the mission of providing meaningful employment to adults with disabilities through the operation of a premium, first-run movie theater.

Oklahoma University’s Sooner Shop

QSC brings in the noise with its Premium Business Music portfolio of amplifiers, mixers and loudspeaker for Oklahoma University’s Sooner Shop.

Goodrich Quality Theaters - Kendall 11 GDX

Goodrich Quality Theaters has recently updated its newest Kendall 11 GDX complex in Oswego, Illinois, becoming the very first QSC Certified Theater in North America.

Nordisk Film’s multi-level Cineplex

Nordisk Film’s multi-level Cineplex at Scandinavia’s largest shopping centre in Denmark has installed a fully integrated Q-SYS audio and video platform.

Knoebels Amusement Park

Knoebels' successful upgrade to

Q-SYS creates memorable experiences for their guests, while allowing for the future potential needs of the park.

Chicago Teacher's Union

Q-SYS Platform used for third-party device integration and in-room control in 24 different meeting spaces without dedicated control processing hardware.

TIAA Bank Field

Q-SYS expands the video experience at the NFL Jaguar’s TIAA Bank Field.

South Carolina House of Representative Chambers

The South Carolina House of Representatives, which is home to 124 part-time citizen legislators, oversaw a massive restructuring of the Chamber’s AV facilities.

York Minster

Q-SYS delivers network audio and control to the largest Gothic cathedral in Northern Europe.

Bethany Christian Services

Q-SYS simplifies Bethany Christian Services' teleconferencing needs across the United States.

Journey of Lights Parade

Illuminating the possibilities of the park experience with Q-SYS network audio and control.

Thunder Valley Casino

Thunder Valley Casino Resort leverages the Q-SYS Platform to reduce complexity and cost with their AV system.

BORUSSIA-PARK Stadium

BORUSSIA-PARK stadium in Germany selected the Q-SYS Platform to upgrade its audio system in a tight deadline.

City Social London

Q-SYS loudspeaker and amplifiers elevate the audio experience at City Social London.

International Car Show

The Q-SYS Platform was used to process and route over 500 channels of pre-recorded and live audio channels from several different mixing consoles for the BMW and Volkswagon stands.

Statue of Liberty Museum

Q-SYS delivers an immersive audio experience at the Statue of Liberty Museum.

Alamo Drafthouse

QSC provides a complete solution to this multi-zone themed installations, restaurant and sports bar, including DSP, control, power, loudspeakers, and monitoring.

Chicago Police Department

Q-SYS system implemented for real-time information and support to handle multiple officers and sources.

Santiago International Airport

Reliable audio and paging system enhances safety and efficiency at Santiago International Airport.
